heading: the return of camp
subheading: in stark contrast to the overly serious turn the zork series took in 1995, zork grand inquisitor returns to its roots of quirky puzzles and wry humor. players embark on a quest to end the tyrannical rule of the grand inquisitor, a megalomaniacal despot bent on ridding the great underground empire of magic once and […]
author: gregory angelo
